naslov: Prodaja kuće, Milna, otok Brač, centar (prodaja)
opis: Milna otok Brač, prodaja prekrasne kamene kuće u srcu mjesta. U samom centru slikovitog mjesta Milna, na zapadnoj obali Brača, smjestila se šarmantna kuća koja svojom autentičnom arhitekturom i pažljivo uređenim interijerom oduševljava već na prvi pogled. Obložena prepoznatljivim bračkim kamenom, ova kuća odiše mediteranskom elegancijom i svakim svojim detaljem priča priču o stilu, udobnosti i profinjenosti. Smještena na idealnoj poziciji, pruža očaravajući pogled prema moru i nezaboravne zalaske sunca, što ovu nekretninu čini zaista posebnom i jedinstvenom u Milni. Kuća ima ukupnu  površinu od 167 m² i proteže se na tri etaže, uz dodatni vrt površine 67 m². Sastoji se od dva potpuno opremljena dvosobna apartmana, svaki s modernom kuhinjom, kupaonicom i malim balkonom. U prizemlju se nalazi prostrana dnevna soba, veliki ured koji se po potrebi može pretvoriti u dodatnu spavaću sobu, kupaonica, odvojeni toalet, kao i prostor s perilicom i sušilicom rublja. Svaka prostorija opremljena je klima uređajem, a dodatnu udobnost osiguravaju stropni ventilatori u nekim sobama. Prozori i balkonska vrata imaju ugrađene komarnike, dok su drvene grilje postavljene na prozore s dvostrukim staklom, a aluminijske grilje štite balkonske otvore. Ispod kuće nalazi se terasa s natkrivenom pergolom i zidanim roštiljem, savršena za opuštanje ili druženja u toplim ljetnim večerima. Vrt, zaseban od kuće, uređen je s mediteranskim biljem koje prostoru daje dodatni šarm i privatnost. Nekretnina se prodaje potpuno namještena i opremljena, spremna za korištenje bez dodatnih ulaganja. Za sve dodatne informacije možete nazvati direktno na broj +385 911119250 Darko Svedrec BSc.ing. Licencirani agent (HGK) GSM: +385 911119250 e-mail: darko.svedrec@dogma-nekretnine.com Milna, Island of Brač – For Sale Beautiful Stone House in the Heart of the Village Located in the very center of the picturesque town of Milna, on the western coast of Brač, this charming house delights at first sight with its authentic architecture and carefully designed interior. Clad in the famous Brač stone, the house exudes Mediterranean elegance and tells a story of style, comfort, and refinement in every detail. Ideally positioned, it offers breathtaking views of the sea and unforgettable sunsets, making this property truly special and unique in Milna. The house offers a total living area of 167 m² and is spread over three floors, accompanied by a 67 m² garden. It consists of two fully equipped two-bedroom apartments, each with a modern kitchen, bathroom, and small balcony. The ground floor features a spacious living room, a large office (which can easily be converted into an additional bedroom), a bathroom, a separate toilet, and a laundry area with both a washing machine and dryer. Every room is equipped with air conditioning, and some rooms also feature ceiling fans for added comfort. All windows and balcony doors have built-in insect screens. Wooden shutters are installed on double-glazed windows, while balcony doors are protected with aluminum shutters. Below the house is a charming terrace with a covered pergola and built-in stone barbecue – ideal for relaxing or entertaining during warm summer evenings. The separate garden area is beautifully landscaped with Mediterranean plants, adding privacy and charm to the property. The house is being sold fully furnished and equipped, ready for immediate use without any additional investment. For more information, please contact: Darko Svedrec, BSc. ing.
